channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours

item.title: [+3054] Conan Plays Free Bird w/ Will Ferrell, Ben Harper, Beck etc.
item.description: Final performance with Will Ferrell, Beck, Conan, Max Weinberg, Ben Harper and others to close Conan O'Brien's 7-month stretch on The Tonight Show. You had a nice run Coco. Screw you, NBC.

item.title: [+2397] 25 Clever Exam Answers (PICS)
item.description: These are the types of people that become powerful CEOs of major internet companies.

item.title: [+2331] Conan's Final 'Tonight Show' Monologue, Farewell Speech
item.description: Below: Conan O'Brien's final "Tonight Show" monologue and farewell speech.

item.title: [+1839] ............ can you do this? [GIF]
[+1749] Facebook Snatches User's Vanity URL And Sells It To Company
item.description: This looks really, really bad. An avid Facebook user named Harman Bajwa says that his Facebook vanity Url - Facebook.com/Harman - was unceremoniously revoked and sold to a business. Thing is...Harman is the guy's name...so using your own name violates TOS?

item.title: [+1598] Conan O'Brien Exits 'Tonight Show' with Jokes and Grace
item.description: The outgoing "Tonight Show" host -- who has become the heroic, idealized "Coco" to dejected fans -- could not have seemed more optimistic and noble as he bid farewell on his final show. And he was just bitter enough. "We have one hour to steal every single item in this studio," O'Brien told his audience, who gave him several standing ovations.

[+674] Dolphins Smarter, More Self-Aware than Previously Realized
item.description: When human measures for intelligence are applied to other species, dolphins are second only to humans in brainpower, according to new research.

item.title: [+650] Find Out The Real Meaning Of Flags [PIC]
[+646] RIAA-Defying Creator of @diditleak, Alan Carton, Dead at 23
item.description: For two years, the Twitter account @diditleak was the secret weapon of online listeners and music critics alike. In real time, the account, which ultimately garnered over 11,500 followers, announced whenever a digital copy of a particularly desirable record first hit the Internet. For that it became a beloved resource of torrent-hungry music fans…

item.title: [+584] Conan O'Brien Debuts Tonight Shows $4.8 Million Mascot
item.description: Conan debuts the new Tonight Show mascot: 2009 Kentucky Derby Winner ‘Mine that Bird’, who came out wearing a Mink Snuggie and watched restricted NFL Super Bowl footage for 30 seconds, costing NBC a grand total of $4.8 million.

item.title: [+577] On the PlayStation 3: Hello hypervisor, I'm geohot
item.description: Hacker GeoHot, famous for the blackra1n jailbreaking software for the iPhone has finally hacked the PS3 after 5 months of hard work.

item.title: [+569] Conan vs. Leno: The Civil War Reenactment (video)
item.description: Jimmy Kimmel weighs in with perhaps the funniest parody yet...

item.title: [+535] 8 Trends Men Wear That Women Hate
item.description: Guys, we've heard it time and time again and we get it --- you hate the trends that girls fall for. You can't stand our oversized sunglasses, you despise that we wear spandex as pants, and you detest how we insist on adding a belt to everything. Well, since we're all being honest, we're finally ready to issue a rebuttal...

item.title: [+511] College-O-Vision II
